events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store and I want to request a refund because it does not fit me well and I have not used it.
The system has categorized the inquiry as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding returning the product.
A customer support agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case to assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket doesn’t fit well. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is in its original condition with all tags attached?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still has all tags on it. I’m ready to send it back as soon as I get return instructions.
Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated your refund request and you will receive an email shortly with the prepaid shipping label to return the jacket.
Thank you very much for the quick response and for providing the shipping label. I appreciate the help!
The refund case has been resolved. The customer will return the product using the prepaid label and receive a full refund upon receipt.
Just checking in to see if you’ve received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with. Please let us know.
Yes, I received the refund in my account yesterday. Thank you again for handling everything so efficiently.
The refund case has been formally closed following confirmation that the refund was successfully processed and the customer is satisfied.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer to gather feedback about their experience with our support team.
